name: TLC
paragraphs: TLC, part of the Discovery Network, wanted to reach more audiences in the middle east, especially the Arab audiences. As an integrated communications agency, we developed a whole new content strategy with focus on Arabized content to reach the Arab audiences. The content strategy was supported by strategic advertising to optimize all channels of communications. We achieved a 10% growth in organic followership and 30% growth in engagement.

gallery.title: My big fat fabulous life, Season 3

og.title: TLC campaign
og.description: developed a whole new content strategy with focus on Arabized content to reach the Arab audiences
